jchess.gamelogic

Class BoardAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.gamelogic.BoardAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoard, IBoardAgent

    public final class BoardAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBoardAgent
    This class is responsible to manage underlying "Board" (only) related data. It keeps the state of the Board and facilitates game-logic with numerous operations.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
